ZITE_BROKER_URL=redis://:kobo@redis-main.domain.name:6379/3
PUBLIC_DOMAIN_NAME=zite.io
SOCIAL_AUTH_GOOGLE_OAUTH2_KEY=
SOCIAL_AUTH_GOOGLE_OAUTH2_SECRET=
EMAIL_ENABLE=1
DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL=dev.zite@gmail.com
DJNGO_EMAIL_BACKEND=django.core.mail.backends.smtp.EmailBackend
DJANGO_EMAIL_USE_TLS=0
DJANGO_EMAIL_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
DJANGO_EMAIL_PORT=587
DJANGO_EMAIL_HOST_USER=dev.zite@gmail.com
DJANGO_EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD=
